name: Lamina
description:
Features
  • determine the generation of map/monsters
  • each kind of monster has two forms, depending on the type of terrain
  • turn-based fight
CONTROLS 
  • Click --- Move/Attack/Use Magic
  • R --- Retry
LAMINA'S STORY

The evil wizard, Lamina, was plotting something. He practiced the black magic on a piece of land at the end of the world . The black magic can convert normal creatures into horrible monsters and make them follow the orders of the wizard. Fortunately, Lamina has not yet fully grasped this magic, and the monsters will still turn back to its original state in a certain environment. You have to find Lamina (the boss, coming soon) and stop his conspiracy before everything is too late.
